minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both family financial concerns and stress management & work-life balance today.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: You're working 16-hour days. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The investor pressure is intense, but I don't want it to affect our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: You're working 16-hour days. You've been working 80-hour weeks for months. This is affecting your health and our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Maybe we can set some boundaries - no work calls after 9 PM?

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: You're working 16-hour days. What happens to our home loan and savings if this doesn't work out?

action_items.task: Create work-life balance plan and share with family
Schedule weekly family check-ins to discuss business progress
